changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.MeasurementUnit(unit_name) SELECT 'degc' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit WHERE unit_name = 'degc' );

INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit) SELECT measurementunit_id, measurementunit_id FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = M.measurementunit_id );

changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.comment: Mimicking conversions from C to other measurement units
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset) SELECT measurementunit_id, C.to_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M CROSS JOIN ( SELECT to_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset FROM wres.UnitConversion UC INNER JOIN wres.MeasurementUnit MU ON MU.measurementunit_id = UC.from_unit WHERE MU.unit_name = 'C' GROUP BY to_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset ) AS C WHERE M.unit_name = 'degc' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = C.to_unit );
changeSet.comment: Mimicking conversions to C from other measurement units
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset) SELECT C.from_unit, M.measurementunit_id, factor, initial_offset, final_offset FROM wres.MeasurementUnit M CROSS JOIN ( SELECT from_unit, factor, initial_offset, final_offset FROM wres.UnitConversion UC INNER JOIN wres.MeasurementUnit MU ON MU.measurementunit_id = UC.to_unit WHERE MU.unit_name = 'C' ) AS C WHERE M.unit_name = 'degc' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.to_unit = M.measurementunit_id AND UC.from_unit = C.from_unit );
